ygData.subject: Re: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: *dances around like an idiot* Finally hit lv 56 Knight. And I need one more peice of Deepwater Armor before its complete. *is proud* Anyhow
ygData.messageBody:
*dances around like an idiot*<br><br>Finally hit
lv 56 Knight. And I need one more peice of Deepwater
Armor before its complete. *is proud*<br><br><br>Anyhow
glugnus, if this is your very first time, my suggestion to
you is delete your Shadow Knight and start a new
char. Why? Because Shadow Knights are a very bad class
for new people, and Troll is a very bad race for new
people. Both get killed easily by monsters and NPCs.
Start a character of a good race, religion and class
and i guarantee the game will be 5 times funner for
you. Dont start a shadow knight until you've had lots
of experience, and want to commit enough time to
level up your SK. SKs (shadow knights) level slowly. My
advice is pick an Elven race or Halfling. Halflings
level quite fast, and they're hunting area is very nice
for a long time. Dont go into Human race, because
they are practically blind in the dark. You wouldn't
beleive how many people always pick Human when they first
buy EQ. Dont do it. Unless perhaps you want to be a
Monk and dont want to be evil (iksar)(only humans and
iksar can be monk, and iksars are hated by a lot of
NPCs). So go with the Halfling or Elven race, if you
want the best out of the game. Classwise? Your own
choice. But I'd stick away from Rogues if your new too.
They take some experience. classes like Mage, Necro
(sometimes), cleric, druid, warrior (especially), monk are
good for newer people. The other classes take a bit
more experience. Be warned though if you pic a
Necromancer many other races will hate you and probably
attack you on site. You need to be careful, but if you
level your necro up enough you'll be quite
powerful.<br>Dark Elf is the only evil race a newbie should go with
(even though you probably shouldn't) because they're
hometown is in a good area, its pretty close to Freeport
(human town) so theres lots of people in those areas.
<br><br>Hope my advise has helped, and I know it sounds a
little confusing. Go on sites like
www.everlore.com<br>and everquest.allakhazam.com for info, and other
newbie help. <br><br><br>Seres Holyblade - Now Level 56
Knight of Karana Server.
